headline: PG&E's Aerial System Drone Fleet Supports Safe, Reliable Energy System
summary: The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) recognizes April 26 as National Drone Safety Day. The nationwide campaign is dedicated to educating the public on the importance of safe drone operation in recreation and business operations.

raw.headline: PG&E's Aerial System Drone Fleet Supports Safe, Reliable Energy System
raw.summary: The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) recognizes April 26 as National Drone Safety Day. The nationwide campaign is dedicated to educating the public on the importance of safe drone operation in recreation and business operations.

headline: PG&E (NYSE:PCG) Reports Q1 Earnings With US$607M Net Income; Updates 2025 Guidance
summary: PG&E (NYSE:PCG) recently announced Q1 2025 earnings, reporting increased sales of USD 5,983 million from USD 5,861 million the previous year, though net income declined to USD 607 million from USD 732 million. Despite the decrease in earnings per share from USD 0.34 to USD 0.28, the company's updated earnings guidance projects positivity, likely adding weight to PG&E's 8% share price increase over the last quarter. This aligns with broader market gains where major indexes experienced general...

headline: PG&E price target raised to $22 from $20 at Jefferies
summary: Jefferies analyst Julien Dumoulin-Smith raised the firm’s price target on PG&E to $22 from $20 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. With wildfire reform and enhancements expected late FY25, the firm’s outlook for PG&E “remains largely unchanged from February,” the analyst tells investors in a preview. Regulatory filings in FY25 stand to strengthen the company’s 9% EPS growth guidance through FY28, the analyst added. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving br

headline: PG&E Q1 Earnings Lower Than Expected, Revenues Increase Y/Y
summary: PCG's first-quarter earnings lag the Zacks Consensus Estimate, while revenues grow year over year. The company's 2025 adjusted EPS guidance remains unchanged.

headline: PG&E (PCG) Q1 Earnings and Revenues Miss Estimates
summary: PG&E (PCG) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -5.71% and 2.06%, respectively, for the quarter ended March 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

raw.headline: PG&E (PCG) Q1 Earnings and Revenues Miss Estimates

headline: PG&E: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: On a per-share basis, the Oakland, California-based company said it had net income of 28 cents. Earnings, adjusted for amortization costs and non-recurring costs, came to 33 cents per share. The results fell short of Wall Street expectations.

raw.headline: PG&E: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: On a per-share basis, the Oakland, California-based company said it had net income of 28 cents. Earnings, adjusted for amortization costs and non-recurring costs, came to 33 cents per share. The results fell short of Wall Street expectations.
